trends: There has been one other sighting in Keyser
There were no other sightings in Keyser on or around April 10th 1981
Summary: Original report submitted 12/29/07, date of sighting is changed to 4/10/81 (est.)
divs: sighting detailssee original submission on 12\29\07 after careful study i have changed my estimated date of even to 4\10\81. saw disc shaped ufo day time, sun had just set below horizon, watched it briefly high above me, perhaps 500 feet, motionless, no sound, then it flew south between new creek mountain and knobley moutain ranges very fast, i now estimate it flew 20 miled in about 10 seconds.
